name: Playoff Meatballs
author: AMYM20
summary: These meatballs have been in my family for generations. The barbeque sauce adds a special kick! I serve these every Sunday during football season and every week they disappear!
ingredients: ¾ cup shredded mild Cheddar cheese
directions: In a large bowl, mix together the ground beef, eggs, oatmeal, onion, Cheddar cheese, ketchup, salt, and pepper using your hands
Form into tiny meatballs about 1 inch wide
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Add the meatballs, and cook, turning frequently, until browned, about 10 minutes
Use a slotted spoon to transfer the meatballs to a baking dish
Bake for 30 minutes in the preheat oven, until sauce is thick and meatballs are cooked through
